item.title: Long Island Rail Road strike averted as unions ask Trump to step in
item.description: The largest union representing LIRR employees has joined four other unions to authorize the first strike in over 30 years, but the strike would not st...

item.title: Congress asks if Boar's Head deli meat plant tied to outbreak will be fit to reopen
item.description: Lawmakers have summoned Boar's Head deli meat officials to face a federal food safety committee

item.title: 3 killed in 2nd strike on alleged Venezuelan drug boat, Trump says
item.description: Three people have been killed in a second U.S. strike on an alleged Venezuelan drug boat, according to President Donald Trump.

item.title: WATCH: Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon tease season 4 of 'The Morning Show'
item.description: The stars say the show will continue to tackle tough topics in journalism.

item.title: WATCH: Houston Texans' Azeez Al-Shaair on his bond with coach Nick Caley
item.description: "He was the first person I ever opened up to," the Houston linebacker told ABC News' Will Reeve.
